author: {'steamid': '76561198269508440', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 3, 'playtime_forever': 3771, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 903, 'last_played': 1605898805}
review:
Bueno, segundo intento con este juego.

La verdad que termine comprandolo por los viejos momentos que vivi jugando al Ultima Online y este se me hacia similar a simple vista. Pero no es asi, eso no quiere decir que sea malo, simplemente no alcanza a los talones del UO.

Digo segundo intento pero que lo compre y lo reembolse y ahora lo volvi a comprar para darle una chance.

Lo malo simplemente es la casi NULA presencia de jugadores en los servidores latinoamericanos, con decir que hay 3 jugadores estoy siendo generoso, solo hay un promedio de 30 en el servidor de europa, que no anda con lag, se puede jugar, pero son todos jugadores rusos, asi que la comunicacion es muy dificil.

El sistema de crafteo esta bastante entretenido, al igual que la caza y la construccion, creo que son los puntos mas importantes de este juego.

Lo que me desiluciono es que no hay criaturas "extrañas" o "malvadas" para matar, simplemente te puedes enfrentar a osos, jabalies, zorro, lobos y deja de contar, asi que es bastante aburrido el PvE. Aunque ahora vi que van a poner un parche con una tierra maldita y criaturas nuevas, eso va a estar bastante interesante, espero que le de mas vida al PvE, sino simplemente tienes la paz de jugar al Sims y creo que por eso esta tan vacios los servidores PvE (aunque entendi que en algunas zonas de los PvE si se puede hacer PvP).

Otra cosa a rescatar es que cada uno se puede crear un servidor y modificar a su gusto la cantidad de skill ganada, recursos, etc. No se bien por que se puede crear tantos servidores, debe de ser por que esta en testeo. Pero esto esta bueno para conocer bien el juego.

La verdad que espero que le den mas vida por que vale la pena, aunque en este momento por la falta de jugadores es bastante aburrido.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967985876', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 31652, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 24445, 'last_played': 1500305100}
review:
Here is my comment and hope it will serve as a good reference to any players who intented to buy this game.

Some of the good review for this game have been quite old and no reflecting the current game model.

Over the past few month this game have gone from good to worst and the reason are as follow

Siege- the new siege mechanism now can only be done in a fixed interval. Player have no rights to choose the siege time. So the timing maybe at you work hours or sleeping hours depending on your timezone. Recently dev "improve" the siege making it now easy to siege and harder to build. Depending where you live you will lost your effort when you come back from work or sleep,  

Resource - The amount of resource needed to build your domain is ridiculously high. Important resource like iron is very limited. A map with 100 player can have as little as 60 node in the server at the respawn of 30-60 min. That is like at most 1 node and less per person. Player have to grind like mad to lvl up especially in the end game. The new insight  help to imrpove your lvl but you will often find you lack the resource to make the stuff needed for your lvling. Dev also mention they are looking to make endgame resource even more of a grind and harder to get. 

End game-  the game is fun while you are still at your starting stage that where most of the good reviews come in. However, as you reaches end game (iron tools lvl) you will find yourself in a grinding hell. mining, hunting and woodcutting. There is no one to PVP as everyone is busy with their grind. 

Developer - they are unlikely to listen to your comment or ideas and seem to have their owns ideas which they are going implement. Their command of english is not as good which resulted their patch note is a mess. For example" Fixed a bug in the crucible and the crucible workshop, due to which it was possible to obtain steel, excluding costs of cast iron." It did not specified that if you filled those 2 structure to fill up the slots you will lost your stuff. Afterwhich, they shamelessly claim this is the intended function and refuse to reinburse the players who maximise their production building. They seem to think the players are money trees and cutting corners in their "fixed". They also have no issue with implement feature that waste your time.

So I will strongely recommend not to buy this game at the current state it is just a waste of money. There is no one to pvp and the current model is just a endless grind.

author: {'steamid': '76561198123319871', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 28, 'playtime_forever': 71, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 48, 'last_played': 1489258403}
review:
Ho acquistato il gioco da molto prima della sua uscita su steam. Lentamente procede il suo sviluppo, sta crescendo. Il problema che odio di più e che me lo fa abbandonare ogni volta che mi vien voglia di riprovarlo, è la fame assurda, irrealistica, fastidiosa del personaggio. Mangia troppo, non fai in tempo a fare qualcosa in gioco che devi rimangiare, in pratica perdi tutto il tempo per sfamarti. L'inizio del gioco, se sei da solo, è veramente arduo. Sul combat pvp e skill non dico nulla, mai provato. 
Se vi piace il genere, potete seguirlo ( ogni tanto offrono keys gratuite del gioco sui siti ), ma finchè non abbassano drasticamente la fame, non mi sento di promuoverlo
developer_response: We have repeatedly simplified the mechanics of eating and now it is not difficult to keep your character fed.

author: {'steamid': '76561198043852898', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 16, 'playtime_forever': 3082, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2685, 'last_played': 1674595140}
review:
Ich kann an dieser Stelle nur sagen, das Spiel gefällt mir sehr. Wenn es jemandem zu lange dauert, alles zu erlernen dann liegt das eigentlich nur an dem jeweiligen Server. Diese sind einstellbar. Das 2D System stört mich überhaupt nicht. Ob Pve oder PvP hier wird für jeden was geboten. Man kann sogar kostenfrei eigene Server erstellen. Diese sind aber nicht geschützt. Alles in allem finde ich es ist ein gelungenes Spiel. Ich vergebe 9/10 Punkten. Ein Punkt Abzug gibt es nur, da man die Server nicht schützen kann.

Es gibt regelmäßige Updates, und sogar Wechsel auf die Jahreszeiten.

author: {'steamid': '76561198002756056', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 19074, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 14791, 'last_played': 1546224607}
review:
재밌습니다. 고전틱한 그래픽과 생존 크래프팅 요소가 잘 어우러졌구요 꽤 오랜시간동안 꾸준히 업뎃을 하고있습니다.

사람이 젤 많은 서버는 유럽서버 쪽인데 핑과 대기시간 그리고 언어의 장벽이있어서

아시아 서버 권합니다 현재 일본애들이 꺵판치고 있지만. pvp 서버가 아니라 PVE 서버를 하시면

원하는 사람만 PVP 할수 있습니다. (PVP 존이 따로있음) 그외에는 평화모드라 결코 죽일 수 없습니다. 

참고로 죽으면 모든 템(착용템까지도) 떨굽니다. 만만하게 늑대나 곰 여우등을 보셨다가 골로갑니다. 멧돼지도 꽤쎕니다.

노가다가 심한 편이라곤 하나 여럿이서 모여한다면 꽤 재밌습니다. 

안타깝게도 혼자하네요 ㅠㅠ 한국유저가 많아졌으면합니다. 추천합니다.
ㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡ

목공, 석공, 대장장이가 1순위  벌목 채광, 무두질 2순위 가죽세공 요리 농사 채집 3순위 전투스킬은 청동셋 뜨면 키웁시다.

또 2017년 예정패치로는 1. 거래시스템 추가 2. 새로운 지역 추가 3. 테이밍 스킬 추가 4. 인챈트 시스템 추가 등이 있습니다. 서버에 유저 보기 힘들지만 꾸준히 하다보면 많아요!! 아시아 서버는 한국인이 젤 많은거 같아요. 맵도 작으면 업뎃해주고 개발자가 참 성실합니다.

ㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡㅡ

author: {'steamid': '76561197965351205', 'num_games_owned': 495, 'num_reviews': 110, 'playtime_forever': 308, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 308, 'last_played': 1486052309}
review:
Pay2win: mounts that are faster it seems.. not sure if you can tame bears or not at some point so i'm unsure about this, but you can instantly buy a bear for like 30$.

Awesome game if you live in 1998 or so. Otherwise its a watch your ore smelt, cut down 500000 trees, kill 500 ravens, 500 deer. Then you get to make some primitive items. (If you have premium, otherwise double these numbers)

Timesink aside, the game runs poorly, seems like its flash or something.

combat is ok I guess.. (for 1998)

If this game had come out in 1998, I'd say Rust was its spiritual successor and better in everyway.
developer_response: Mounts in the store are not faster than those that you can catch in the game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198325219075', 'num_games_owned': 1113, 'num_reviews': 24, 'playtime_forever': 492, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 492, 'last_played': 1485980885}
review:
Игра чем то похожа на Голодайку. На первых порах вечная борьба с голодом, благо вокруг полно сьестного и в нвентаре сразу есть булочки на первое время. Можно скрафтить дофига всего. Прокачка медленная и тяжёлая, но в итоге очень полезная.  После того как от меня убежал Заяц , а Лиса и вовсе убила полез искать вики или гайд. Рекомендую ознакомится, особенно тем кто только открывает для себя этот жанр.
Явные плюсы это Онлайн. деревни других игроков можно сказать на каждом шагу.Присутствует игровой чат.  Все зависит от наполняемости сервера, а это уже в руках самих игроков. Можно кстати создать свой сервак и погамать с френдами. 
Может стать хорошим преемником Ultima Online. Игра часто обновляется и быстро растёт. 
Сейчас есть небольшие проблемы с задержкой и стабильностью, но я думаю это исправят.
Минус или скорее непревычно это Массштаб. кнопкой + и - меняется весь экран а не просто придлижение на карте. Хочеш прочесть что ты скрафтил жмеш + и тут же вырастают кнопки инвентаря. но этов сетаки ранний доступ и к этому можно привыкнуть. пусть это будет не БАк а Фитча ;-) 
Еще непонравился сам перс. Выбрал играть за Мужика но фигура у него Унисекс. неплохо бы добавить настройку перса.
Вообщем потраченных на ранний доступ не жалею, надеюсь игра выростет во что то значимое, а пока пойду изучать вики и форум.
upd1. еще немного поиграл заметил такой параметр как Сытось. она здесь разная от мяса и  овощей одна. тоесть для норм существования персу необходима Разнообразная еда. помоему разрабы за Здоровое питание ;-) 
Ачивки тоже набиваются быстро. рекомендую вначале оббегать все кругом и выбрать хорошее место под базу. там где много руды и леса. бегать можно не просто так а в поисках сокровища. типа мини квест дается раз в день

author: {'steamid': '76561198210326356', 'num_games_owned': 72, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 2052, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1766, 'last_played': 1485859136}

author: {'steamid': '76561198348347701', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 531, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 531, 'last_played': 1485955438}
review:
Приятная ретро графика, игроки строят целые города, обилие рецептов крафта и построек, много профессий. 
Из минусов - система PvP и охоты пока немного грубая и неуклюжая, но игра не ощущается сырой

author: {'steamid': '76561198118934258', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 580, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 216, 'last_played': 1485921748}
{'steamid': '76561198073670175', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 51, 'playtime_forever': 9610, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5141, 'last_played': 1548591047}
review:
Итак это не первый мой опыт в симуляторе ходьбы и бомжа так что я ожидал гораздо худшего, так же это ранний доступ так что много ждать не стоит. Это  мои впечатления от данной игры. Я кстати говоря на нее слегка подсел.  Начну пожалуй с минусов.

- Надоедливая музыка на фоне не смотря на довольно хорошую музыку она однообразна и быстро надоедает. Очень сильно достала, разрабам не мешает добавить больше  музыкальных композиций или хотя бы "звуков леса". 

- Крошечная стартовая территория доминиума на ней невозможно разместить экстренный набор строений. Поиграв подольше превратился в одержимого перфекциониста. Но увеличить территорию не помешает.

- Ужасающий путь движения к цели персонаж будет идти только кратчайшим путем отсюда втыкания в ящики, стены, двери. Управление с клавиатуры спасает положение.

- Нет возможности перенести постройку, одно дело   если нельзя переносить дом или же кузню а другое дело ящик или корзину. Крайне убого.  Отсюда же
- Нет возможности снести ненужную постройку за остаточный процент потраченных ресурсов. 

- Кривая система голода. Жрать хочется постоянно и теперь еще и разной еды. Большую часть времени я рыскал по лесу в поисках подножного корма. 

- Нет нормального обучения и слишком длительный старт. Для меня это была не проблема, но вот за один день я увидел более 100 заброшенных поселений. На серваке все друг друга знают в лицо нет новых игроков, а те что приходят брасают игру. Это очень печально.

- Мало навыков и нет ограничений по прокачке. Вот это уже реально лажа можно стать супер-мега перфекционистом и  изучить вообще все. Из за этого нет уникальных профессий. 

Теперь плюсы

- Ламповость игры.

- Нет NpS кроме живности.

- Нет магии/Эльфоф/Оркофф/Зомби. Зато есть чудовища

- Крафт он реально хороший.

- Challenge какой ни какой а есть.

- Нет жесткой привязки к Донату хотя есть Внутриигровой магазин. Добавили плюшек за донат но ничего выдающегося. Шмоток для кастомизации героя нет, как нет и возможности изменить внешность героя. короче АД для казуала. Кстати кнопки УБИТЬ всех Человеков нет.

- Свобода действий.

На этом пока все про баги и лаги писать смысла не имеет это все таки ранний доступ. Но хочу отметитить работу над ошибками, разрабы быстро фиксят и довольно часто патчат и апдейдят. Было сделано мнго хорошего и я надеюсь что разрабы не остановятся на достигнутом.
Надеюсь что проект не потонет по этому не жмитесь  потратьте 400  рублей и поддержите производителя.

author: {'steamid': '76561198042482596', 'num_games_owned': 155, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 21118, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 5638, 'last_played': 1599790870}
review:
Let me preface this: I have only been playing with a friend I know in reality.

I recommend this game, It maybe a bit grindy for some, however this should be one of the games that you play with another person. Sure you can go it alone, but Grinding is much easier done with a second person. 

The price is the largest concern, I think it should probably drop about 5 USD to be affordable across the board.

author: {'steamid': '76561198113421444', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 15940, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1796, 'last_played': 1525344787}
review:
とにかく序盤がきついゲームです。生まれたばかりのキャラクターはスキルもレベルも無いので、資源採集だけでもかなり苦労します。より高度な資源を得るにはスキルレベルを上げなければならないのですが、このレベリングの経験値テーブルが非常にマゾい仕様のため最初にできることはほとんどありません。そしてひたすら単純作業を要求されます。ひたすら同じ資源を採取したり、ひたすら同じものをクラフトしては捨てる感じです。なので正直作業プレイ感が半端なく途中で飽きます。

また最初に得られる領土は本当に小さくアップグレードしないとモノもベッドもほとんど置けません。しかし領土拡張のアップグレードに要求される作業量もこれまたマゾ仕様であり時間がかかります。特に他の方も書いていますが三段階目あたりからしんどくなります。

もしかすると課金してプレミアムサービスで遊べばマシかもしれません。課金前提のバランスに
なっているような気がしますので。

個人的には似たようなゲームですとRogaliaの方をおすすめします。

author: {'steamid': '76561198010557481', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1269, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 768, 'last_played': 1485169429}
review:
Ich gebe dem Spiel einen Daumen nach oben. Es ist ein gutes Farmspiel im Stil von Life is feudal, nur in 2 D. 
Ich hab auf einem PVE Server gespielt da ich keinen Wert auf PVP lege. 
Mein dickes Minus war...das leveln dauert im verlauf des Spiels unglaublich lange. man muß Unmengen material farmen um vorran zu kommen, da beim scheitern das material zerstört wird. Für Spieler die nicht 24/7 spielen können fast unmöglich alles zu erreichen, da man sich später spezialisieren muß um leveln zu können.
ABER, ich habe ein tolles Feature entdeckt, jeder Spieler kann sich kostenlos einen eigenen Server mieten und diesen auch im kleinen Rahmen konfigurieren und genau das wiegt mein dickes Minus wieder auf...
Ich hab mir einen eigenen Server erstellt, die Stapelrate, Droprate ect etwas erhöht und siehe da..auch alleine kann man sich nun austoben. Man muß zwar trotzdem viel farmen, aber man kommt vorran .
Das Spiel macht Spaß, für jeden der solche Spiele mag, man sollte sich auch nicht von der 2d Grafik täuschen lassen, man gewöhnt sich dran und sie ist liebevoll gemacht.

author: {'steamid': '76561198090955338', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 26, 'playtime_forever': 41729, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 26108, 'last_played': 1667510619}
review:
13/07/2017
изменил оценку. Забанили кириллицу  в международном чате. Фашисты бл... Моральные уроды, и это русскоязычные разработчики.

Итак что мы имеем. Свобода строительства вырезана напрочь и ограничена пределами доминиума, свобода исследования мира вырезана напрочь и ограничена необходимостью следить за голодом и усталостью, свобода охоты вырезана напрочь и ограничена армейскими аптечками у хищников и даже кабанов, свобода осад насколько понимаю тоже будет вырезана напрочь и ограничена особыми днями.

Помните да старую рекламу? Охоться, строй, исследуй мир...
Сейчас привязаны намертво к доминиуму. Сутки напролёт добываем и перерабатываем добытое. И вот собравшись с друзьями, накопив за неделю ресурсов, решаем разгромить врага. А фиг- ждите судного дня- у нас же реализм в игре.

Насчёт реализма было бы смешно...

Чего так распинаюсь?

А дело в том что осады было последним глотком воздуха и свободы. После кача гринда бесконечного пожирания еды и вина, можно было собраться с друзьями и отвести душу на каком нибудь туземце. Теперь всё. Нет можно конечно, ждать судного дня, который ждёт тот самый туземец.

Вообще если два года назад ключевым было слово СВОБОДА то сейчас слово ЖДАТЬ

Было. Строительство- где хочешь как хочешь даже с друзьями слепить один огромный замок на сколько позволяет фантазия и желание.
Стало- жди пока прокачаешься, найдёшь рецепты, многочисленные циклы машин.
Было. Охота- по быстрому слепил лук и побежал косить зайцев и оленей, сделал загоны и бей хищников.
Стало- жди пока прокачаешься, найдёшь рецепты, сделаешь хорошую броню.
Было. Путешествия- вышел из дома и пошёл исследовать мир.
Стало- три стака еды, причём ещё надо кучу времени на кач земледелия и кулинарии иначе будешь не путешествовать а собирать подножный корм, причём если нет маунта ползаешь как черепаха, потому что перс тяжело болен и пробегает 10 метров максимум.
Было- Осады- берёшь кирку в руки и пошёл крошить, плетни быстро, каменные стены долго и нудно- на то они и каменные.
Стало- жди пока прокачаешься, жди пока баллиста- засохнет, а теперь ещё для начала жди особого волшебного дня, реализм же да, все помнят?

Наверное всё это круто, и подавляющее большинство конечно же хотело именно этого и свобода действий в ранних версиях их раздражала. Наверное так и должно быть в уникальной инди игре где нет давления издателей.

 Играю с апреля 2015 года. Застал ранние версии игры. И именно их и считаю идеальными несмотря на баги. Возможно у меня просто ностальгия по единому серверу. свободе и масштабным войнам без ограничений.

author: {'steamid': '76561198035117711', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 37, 'playtime_forever': 202243, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 27, 'last_played': 1701351696}
review:
Игра залетела в обзорах инета примерно в 2015г. тогда я ее и взял. На старте игра была жутко багованная, особенно на пвп сервере. Грабили дом через текстуры, экран висел итп. Помучился пару часови наххх удалил. Просшло не мало времени, но в 2017г я снова залетел уже на пве сервер лябиум. для ру игроков в основном. Конечно экран плыл, висел ,каждый час перегрузка игры. Короче с 2017г по сей день залетаю туда потрещать со старичками, побегать по карте)) За спиной более 2600часов. С уверенностью могу теперь написать обзор честный.
Минусы:
2023г до сих пор плохая оптимизация. Через браузер невозможно нормально играть. Качайте через стим.
Жрет оперативку и греет пк как ведьмак 3
После часа игры начинает фризить, заплывать экран. Спасает перезагрузка игры.
Маленькая карта мира.
Слабый контент, однообразный. Сбор ресов и крафт. Один данж, некая земля проклятых с боссами и больше ничего. Территория очень мелкая, и там вечно драка за боссов и ресурсы.
Скучная, если любишь данжи, групповые рейды. Тут все самому можно пройти.
Каждый год ивенты без изменений, в год около 6 штук.
Слабое звуковое оформление, до сих пор не изменили озвучку и музыку. Выбешивает музыка одна и та жа уже через час)). 
На слабых пк черный экран и вышибание с игры в любой момент. Лечится пк сборки 2019г + 
усложнение игры для новичков с 2022г. теперь начинаете с голой опой и плучаете люлю не только от зверей, но и в находках ,трупах , тайниках. Что на старте раньше очень игрока выручало, в таких находках можно найти все для быстрого старта, дропчик.
Много, много крафта и кача крафта.
Самое зло, это с 2022г введение поиска рецептов для игроков, теперь можно искать рецепт неделями, тупо на железо или фарм ткани.
слабая боевая система. Ее просто нет в принципе, Нет веток уникальных ,все качают танка двух видов, заточенного на крафт и жирного танка. Класс лука вообще как на пвп, так и на пве особенно никакой даже в топ шмоте и в топ прокачке. Любой удар по жопе ,и ты здох.От среднего моба даже ))
ПЛЮСЫ!!!))
она бесплтна, там есть конечно магазин, но он чисто косметический в основном, да есть премы, но их можно добыть в самой игре и не сложно. Прем ускоряет рост навыков и скорость. Удобная вещь ,но без нее легко живется.
Для любителей старой Ультимы, любителей песочницы и фермы ,тут вы найдете себя.
простой ,понятный кач проф и персонажа.За пару недель по 4ч в день вы можете почти все на максим вкачать и заниматься серьезным крафтом.
В отличии от Теры 2, здесь красивые домены, можно красиво все обустроить в совем вкусе. мест хватает в одном домене для всего.
взрослые игроки, игра без мата и пошлостей малолеток
всегда все помогут на старте ,это как большая семья ,хотя игроков мало.
нет аналогов в этом жанре, есть но там либо платить нужно , либо она 3Д , в таком видеигр нет больше.
Совершенно без доната можно играть с нуля и всегда.
мало места на пк
быстрая загрузка серверов и игры. 
ненапрегает, всегда в мелком мире однообразном можно найти .чем заняться. От создания железа, ткани, до выращиванияния огорода и кулинарии, поиска сокровищь итп. 
Тут не стоит искать экшена, мега битв, истории мира итп. Тут ты просто перс в трусах, и твоя задача построить свой замок, стать великим бойцом или кузнецом. Игра по сути для соло игроков, но кто хочет вместе бегать, то это можно, можно вообще 5 игрокам жить в 1 домене и вместе развиваться, можно и одному)). Попробовать стоит поиграть. Только нее на ноутбуке , и железку хорошую иметь. Иначе обплюетесь от зависаний.

author: {'steamid': '76561198014940948', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 91, 'playtime_forever': 2408, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2001, 'last_played': 1527883453}
review:
The game is still in Alpha, but already has strong basis, notably a nice balancing of the progression, not too easily rewarding, but not grindy-frustrating neither.

In the Pros : 
-Game has its graphic style and a nice Art Direction touch
-UI/Interface is accessible and readable
-Game receives regular updates and is followed by its developper
-Even some seasonnal events with new content (Xmas and else)
-A first solid progression balancing

Still some things that would need improvements for launch : 
-add WASD/ZQSD controls for moving, and not the left-click only
-a search index for crafting ingredients, instead of having to go through all the different crafting recipes to see if an item is useful and for what.
-more wildlife variety (but from Devblog I see it's already incoming)
- some kind of player-base economy tool (auction house, marketplace or something, instead of only direct trade : if you're on a different timezone than your server neighbour, you cannot exchange or trade since you're often alone.
-More social and community tools (guilds, and all associated gameplay, like guilds warfares and such)

It's already a nice Alpha and if continued with the same level of follow-up, could become at launch a really great game.

author: {'steamid': '76561198026953190', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 11, 'playtime_forever': 6253, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6253, 'last_played': 1493978412}
review:
Achtung !!!!! Änderung am Ende , nach über 100 Stunden Spielzeit !!!

Wer Ultima Online kennt , wird Wild Terra Online lieben. 
Für mich keine Frage, DAS ist MEIN Spiel und ich seh auch wie sehr der Publischer an der Entwicklung schraubt.
Potenzial hat das Spiel mehr als genug. Im Moment kann ich nur aus dem PvE - Bereich sprechen. Ich mag persönlich eh kein PvP. 

Klare Weiterempfehlung .......  BLOß NICHT !!!!!!!!

Da wurde jemand aber sehr schnell gierig und verlangt nun für fast alles Geld. Für reiche Menschen mag das ja in Ordnung gehen oder für jemdnem , der ausschließlich dies Game zockt. Es wurde mit kostenlosem Spielen geworben , aber nach und nach ( habe die Entwicklung mitbekommen ) wurde immer mehr alles zu einem "Kauf dich Stark". Einiges vieles , geht ohne kaufen garnicht mehr. 

Fazit: Runter von der Platte und einmal mehr über ein Game Ärgern :-)

author: {'steamid': '76561198139340251', 'num_games_owned': 128, 'num_reviews': 18, 'playtime_forever': 52406, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 31683, 'last_played': 1566061406}
review:
Continuar escribiendo
Excelente juego de supervivencia medieval, te transporta directamente a un mundo completamente hostil, donde la mayor amenaza no son los jugadores, sino el entorno.

Wild Terra, te puede gustar si buscas un survival bastante difícil, y remarco lo de difícil, el progreso es LENTO, pero lento que da miedo, llevo jugando 2-3 semanas, y aun no puedo fabricar una armadura de cuero.
Jugar wild terra lleva consigo el aceptar que este juego no te va a dar las cosas en la mano, desbloquear recetas es laborioso, el subir tus habilidades, conseguir ciertos recursos, todo lleva tiempo y esfuerzo.

Te recomiendo que lo juegues con amigos o busques un grupo, el juego se facilita mucho mas así, dividiendo las tareas entre jugadores.

PVP: INTENSO, las mecánicas parecen básicas, pero al momento de ver como las flechas van y vienen, y los guerreros en primera linea avanzan es épico.

Cosas malas del juego: 
-El juego es MUY lento, lo cual, me gusta, pero a mucha gente le termina por aburrir al ver que no progresa casi nada a diferencia de como se progresa al principio.
-La gente, en algunos servidores es escasa, Iktos (Servidor Brasilero) hay algo de 30 personas en hora pico, nada comparado a Ignos (Servidor Europeo) que tiene una gran mayoría de jugadores online.

Este juego es genial, pero muy grupo-dependiente, vas a hacer poco en este juego jugándolo solo, por suerte, seas del país que seas hay gente de muchos idiomas, si sos bueno y dedicado algún clan te va a dejar entrar.

Recomendadisimo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198008765362', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 9, 'playtime_forever': 3019, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2088, 'last_played': 1490976047}
review:
Отличный проект...много ещё не реализованно, но обновления выходят с завидной регулярностью. Это не один из тех случаев когда человек покупает кота в мешке, а разработчик вдруг забрасывает игру. Данная игра смесь множества жанров, а точнее для каждого она нечто своё...ферма, пвп, тактика, rts, rpg, симулятор замка, деревни...да хоть отшельника-кочевника-охотника. Донат есть. Влияет ли он на балас? Влияет. Как сильно? Ели заметно. 
Сам в проекте достаточно давно, пережито множетво вайпов, тестов...и скажу вам честно, игра стоит вашего внимания.

author: {'steamid': '76561198265234858', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 17, 'playtime_forever': 250, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 116, 'last_played': 1498369939}
review:
Ещё одно браузерное чудище припёрлось в стим). Играл в неё не долго, так что моя оценка субъективна, в принципе всё как бы не плохо, но за непродолжительное время игры уже просматривается некоторый дисбаланс, может разработчики его поправят со временем. 

Поиграв подольше понял, что игруха заточена под донат...играть в неё на данный момент пустая трата времени слишком много кривизны даже для браузерной игрухи, особенно раздражает дурной и геморойный крафт.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007958678', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 19, 'playtime_forever': 3274, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 3274, 'last_played': 1482518845}
review:
Rust + UO

Build stuff, kill dudes and take their stuff, progress your knowledge of how to build stuff.

Pretty fun and quite addictive, despite the main mechanics being starvation and inventory management.

Bug are minor if any, there's enough content already to keep you fighting.

review:
Ccà tous !
Je ne comprends pas les rageux pour moi ce jeu est tres bien mais en alpha!

Pour qu il soit mieux il faudrait plus de monde , pendant mes partie je rencontre 5 à 6 joueurs sur le serveur enfin je croise les persos apres je sais pas combien on est en tout à jouer !!.

Il me faudrait une map de toute urgence ne pas pouvoir me reperer par rapport a la grandeur de la map me stress beaucoup! (on connait l implacement de sa base en permanace par contre ca ce st bien)

Les graphismes sont pas moches et les possibilité de craft du jeu en construction est impressionant,
comme je le repete ce st un jeu finalement online mais au final on est bien seul dans son domaine !

J encourage les Devs pour me remotiver les troupes avant les sorti final !!

author: {'steamid': '76561198076651975', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 169, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 169, 'last_played': 1483812614}
review:
ロシア産mmorpg

往年のUOを感じる2Dビューのmmorpg
正直いまさら何をするのって感じで荒野に放り出される
木を切り、石を集め、獣を狩り拠点を広げていく
pvpとpveサーバーに分かれ、個人サーバーも立てられる
必要素材が膨大すぎるため、シングルプレイで公式サーバーへ
ログインしても単調な作業で素材を集めることがプレイの中心となるだろう
必要素材の緩和等は公式課金の要素によって薄い

楽しみ方としては広げた領土を拡張させpvpを楽しむか
領土内に城、ひいては城下町を作ることだろう

問題は箱庭ゲー特有の作ったところで？といったところ

3Dはちょっと・・・でも時間つぶしに素材を集めて町を作りたいというプレイヤーには
いいのかもしれない

author: {'steamid': '76561197969727318', 'num_games_owned': 2235, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 2511, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2276, 'last_played': 1513365009}
review:
Disclaimer:  Steam does not have a neutral review rating.  Just recommended or not recommended.

I have completely rewritten the review so if some of the people in the comments section don't make sense this may be why.

Since I had a negative experience with the devs, I will leave the review as not recommended.  I will cover this below.

Wild Terra as it stands right now is an early access title.  It has been getting regular updates, usually small ones sprinkled with larger ones here and there.  The title has come a long way in the last 6 or so months before it hit Steam just in terms of character movement which has helped immensely.

I have only played on a PvE server so cannot vouch for the play on a PvP server.  The game is slow paced which I like.  I can sit back and relax while playing.  Game play consists of running around the map collecting resources for building up your dominion (what the game calls your base of operations).  Once you have your dominion built then you can work on expanding it and/or collecting resources to make into useful items needed for the extensive amount of recipes found in the game.  

While wandering the map you can find godsends, which come in the for of decomposed adventurers or crashed wagons.  Inside the godsends you can find items as well as recipe fragments.  The recipes you cannot make from the beginning of the game can be found in these godsends.  Each recipe requires a certain amount of fragments to be found before you can create that item.  From what I can tell it can take from 1 to I believe 4 or 5 fragments to unlock specific recipes.  It seems that once you do unlock a recipe that some recipes have a gold recipe that can be unlocked.  The crafting is deep in the game.

The Map:  This is the biggest issue I have with the game.  Everything is player driven (which isn't a bad thing).  There are no NPC cities or towns.  Everything on the map is one flat surface with trees, water, wild life, and resource nodes.  There is absolutely nothing that stands out that you could reference as to where you are in the world.  Once you have a dominion, you get a marker on the edge of the screen that you can use to get back, but that's it.

Player base:  This is where the game shines for the most part.  Most people in the global chat are very helpful and willing to help people out with questions and issues they have.  Some people leave a chest or storage outside for others to come along and rummage through for anything they may need.  During the Christmas event (before the devs lowered the cost) the stockings were hard to make because they needed a loom which unlocks from recipe fragments (found in godsends) and most weren't able to  make them.  One good person on the server would make the items you needed if you brought them the resources.

The devs:  I was wrongly banned from the Steam forums and it took a week before they realized I was wrongly banned and unbanned me.  The devs seem to just willingly ban anyone from their forums that speak bad about the game or the cash shop or in my case ban the wrong guy.  Instead of making a sticky at the top of the forums that lists exactly what is in the cash shop and opening it to discussion.  I feel everyone that is on the fence about the game has a right to know as much information on the game before they make a purchase.  So that brings up the next part.....

Cash Shop:  Once in the game, you can bring up the cash shop.  Inside you will find titles you can bestow on your character along the lines of Duke and Knight and a handful of others.  If you want a mount, you can pick from horses, deer, wolves, and bears.  If you want to dip into their premium  offering you can get a bonus for your character for a period of time based on how much you wish to spend.  I tried to see what the time length was for this review but the cash shop wouldn't come up for me at time of writing this review.  The premium is described (I wrote this down earlier when I was replying to someone) as:  Doubles chances to get rare items, gathering, building, and crafting speed.  As a PvE player this doesn't bother me in the least.  I don't care what the other guy is getting or what he is doing.  In a PvP setting I can see this as being an issue as the other guy is now pulling out double resources on some of the harder to find resource nodes in the world.  If the rare drop is (no clue what the actual drop rate is) 10% then the premium player is getting 20%.  

Due to how the premium is worded this is how I see it as working.  It could be double to getting rare items and an increase to gathering, building and crafting.  Even though an increase in rares can still be an advantage depending on the drop rate imposed in the game.

Is the game bad?  No and I feel I more than received my monies worth during my past and most likely future game play.  As an early access title the content is limited despite the large amount of items you can craft.  This is an issue that plagues many early access titles and is the bane of the whole ea system in general except for a few exclusions.

I do recommend Wild as the game itself, but you must realize what the game is and what it isn't.  It is not an action packed game full of dazzling sword play and fireballs whizzing inches from your face.  In fact there is no magic to speak of.

I do not recommend Wild Terra based on the actions of the developers.  They seem like they care about the game and are definitely actively working on it, but deleting posts in the Steam forums and banning is definitely not the way to go and sends off bad vibes to current customers and prospective customers.  They need to take the good with the bad, embrace it and use that feedback to allow the game to flourish. 

Verdict: Neutral.  If what you have read appeals to you and you can get past the developers then you can find a nice little time sink here.  If you're like me and try to answer questions for other people in the forums and just be an all around nice guy, then beware that you should probably not talk about the cash shop in any form at least until the devs smarten up and just embrace the contents they provide in the shop and not try to hide them.
developer_response: Hello. Accept my apologies, you were accidentally blocked. You have been unban on forums. Once again, sorry for the incident

author: {'steamid': '76561198092697540', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 29, 'playtime_forever': 2548, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2548, 'last_played': 1483384469}
review:
I have to start by saying that anyone who says that this game is anything like Ultima Online has clearly not played it.
This game lacks so much content that the game consists of literally running outside in a small map for all day long to get very few materials(server has like 20-30 peoplein a good day). Not only this but after wasting your entire day scavenging for materials in an unpopulated server, anything you want to create requires HOURS, or a very boring and tidiuos cycle. As an example ill touch cooking, where if you want to make lets sayyy... porriage, you would have to: 
1. Farm barley(wait about 12hrs for it)
2. go get clay and A LOT of wood
3. make clay into uncooked pots
4. cook plate with more wood(takes FOREVER)
5. go back make RAW porriage
6. cook the plate with porriage again
7. eat it, which destroys the plate/pot

all this takes about a whole days worth or more for one miserable low grade food that only fills one of 5 hunger groups.
so lets say u did this, that eas ur entire days worth ofgsling and/or more. 

Another thing is the exploita of really bad mechanics like trapping an animal and raising ur weaponry skills in ur house to max ina fee hours which makes pvp VERY FUN.  Lietrally train archery and axes and u win thr game,  the slow is pretty much death.

I can go on literally all day about how bad this game is, but that would put even more hours ive already wasted on this waste of time. If you want to play a fun survivor I would say try any other than this. Unless ofcourse, you enjoy farming materials and doing nothing else in a game. Has nothing close to the games it claims to be similar to
developer_response: Thank you for your review. During the last few updates, we have simplified the food system. We will strive to ensure that grinding and survival elements did not cause negative impressions

author: {'steamid': '76561198032137848', 'num_games_owned': 1957, 'num_reviews': 775, 'playtime_forever': 2538, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2522, 'last_played': 1499213248}
review:
Changing my review to negative. Only the early hours were fun and that was only due to the hope I had and before the Devs began revealing their true intent and ddirection. Which was about 40 of them, the hours since have only been logging in for a few minutes every week hoping things would change.  I DEEPLY regret this purchase, and the hours spent. I thought it would develope into what it appeared to be at first, a clone of Haven and Hearth. Yet I suppose the procedural map egenration as opposed to static map disallows all the mechanics of that type of game to exist, or they just don't want to. It's basically a POINTLESS game, you can craft crap, over and over and over. no real quality system, no real farming system, I only log in now once a week to keep my "time-rented" claim and the work it took to make it, if you don't log in for 7 days you lose it all. Now they plan on intriidcuing "chests and keys"..LMAO whatver. Avoid it, it's not worth it, it is fun for a few hours but then, well, you will see the absolute pointlessness of the game in general. Below if my "only had 4 hours" review, you can see the hopes and now you see the end result. Do not bother, it is not worth supporting. It also became the most shocking SCAM game I've ever seen. They want you to pay 15$ just to own it, then to not have your "home" not decay or to make use of the ability to have your own server they want high as 15$ PER MONTH. Yes, they have a huge item mall, it is big time P2W (Or actually pay to progress). Never support these kind of rediuculous games. Russian Devs should tell you all you need to know it seems, at least in this case every stereotype is TRUE.

And the post that got me banned, like most anyone who dares call them out. :

sounds like the usual threats you've become known for in here.. Why you did what? What way? You mean you want me to ask you why you released a pay to play game, then months later implemented a subscription @ 15$ a month to create a huge feature devide between players who do and players who do not? Why would I need to ask you why you did that? Dissapointed in a game going in totally different direction than what it seemed when it was released and people laid out their money to support you? Yeah very much so. What kind of suggestion would you like? What kind of suggestion could you possibly be interested in and what would it matter? 

But ok, here's one for you, even if I COULD figure out what there is left to do now, I have ZERO desire to play little pvp crap. (Or I would have stayed at Haven and Hearth) Yet you take all the ore spawns and put them in PVP zones? For silly premium users to camp and attack non-premium users? so they have something to do with their item mall stuff and premium feature progression? IS that really needed on casual PVE servers?

author: {'steamid': '76561198232564312', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 2, 'playtime_forever': 2401, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1516399784}
review:
Aunque el juego está muy verde, es ya una pequeña joya para los amantes del crafteo, la construcción, etc. con total libertad. Siendo una alfa, tiene ya mucho contenido, una gran cantidad de ítems para fabricar.

Con su apariencia clásica, con gráficos simples y noventeros, parece poca cosa, pero tiene gran proyección en su género, o al menos a mí me lo parece, siempre y cuando los desarrolladores no lo descuiden y vayan implementando sus potencialidades.

Estando en esta fase, ya da para muchas horas de vicio, entre otras cosas porque los crafteos son cada vez más lentos, a medida que avanzas en el desarrollo de tus herramientas, edificios, etc.

El punto flaco, en estos momentos, creo que es sobre todo la monotonía del paisaje, le falta más vidilla para que resulte más agradable moverte con tu personaje por el mapa. Eso y los lags, que no impiden la jugabilidad, pero en ocasiones te obligan a salir y entrar de nuevo en el servidor. Cosas, supongo, normales a estas alturas de su desarrollo.

En cualquier caso, si desarrollan bien la modalidad multijugador y generan una buena comunidad de jugadores, podrían tener un gran éxito en el futuro.

author: {'steamid': '76561198140306250', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 5791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1632014797}
review:
Es un juego muy divertido, a pesar de lo verde que esta tiene mucho contenido y es muy viciante, de lo unico que me puedo quejar es en la dificultad (aunque es mi culpa xD), en los bugs que tiene (los cuales han ido reparando) y en que no hay opciones para configurar graficos ni sonido.
Pero por lo demas es un juego muy bueno, con graficos a los cuales a la mayoria le va bien, con un sistema de "supervivencia" el cual me parece justo y un extenso catalogo de crafting, es un juego que vale la pena comprar y jugar con amigos.

author: {'steamid': '76561197970656054', 'num_games_owned': 1566, 'num_reviews': 21, 'playtime_forever': 196, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'last_played': 1483023542}
review:
[h1]Comparable with Salem - but not favourably[/h1]
Yet.

It is also worth noting that much of my opinion here is just that - purely subjective based on my own preferences. For example; while I do like Wild Terra's skill system (similar to the likes of UO, or simply, 'doing things makes you better at them') - I don't like how unlocks are (currently) managed.

You have to find (randomly?) placed 'Godsend' items on the ground, which come in the form of deceased hunters or wrecked carts which have random crafting recipe fragments in them. You cannot tell what recipe it is for beyond a broad category description until you've used it. Using it simply being putting it in your inventory - so if you're playing with friends, there is no way to specialise your crafting/construction efforts and you're hit with RNG at two levels (finding, then what you get). You cannot even give something of a broader category to your friend unless they've run out in the same direction as you, as picking it up automatically consumes the item.

Salem handled this through a research tree (and quite a detailed one at that!) - I'd dearly love to see Wild Terra adopt something similar. 

In fact it is this element of knowledge progression which most kept me from enjoying WT as it currently stands. 

WT has a lot of potential - have no doubt, and the oft repeated refrain of, 'If steam allowed neutral reviews I'd probably give this one' is true for the current state. 

[h1]Was Salem better in every way?[/h1]
No - Salem had a cash shop which in many ways felt mandatory. (It wasn't - but progress was punishingly slow without.)

So far WT while yes, [b]it does have a cash shop[/b], seems to allow for pretty good rate of progression without ever touching it.

The 'dominium' stones which mark your territory are craftable from objects in the world alone (at least the tiers I've seen so far) and don't require any bought currency for upkeep, which is a [b]huge[/b] plus in WT's favour.

[h1]Who should pick-up WT in its current state?[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]You have someone else to play with - world pops are [i]very[/i] low presently.[/b] Or of course if you just don't mind playing these Survival-esque games alone. I went in with a friend and it has made it more enjoyable to be sure - but we haven't yet found a lot of ways to co-operate meaningfully.
[*][b]You don't mind supporting an early access product which may or may not actually receive future development.[/b] Although updates do currently seem to be coming in at a steady rate!
[/list]

[h1]What I personally want to see added/changed in future updates?[/h1]
[list]
[*][b]Research / Better way of handling unlocking of new structures/craftables.[/b] As outlined above.
[*][b]Mapping![/b] I understand not being given a full world map all nicely filled in for you. Part of this is exploration after all. But give us an idea of where we've been, let us map out our own travels!
[*][b]Give more meaning to the world itself - such that some areas have more value by the resources around them.[/b] Currently resource nodes seem entirely random. They're very plentiful (so far - I've not yet had to deal with finding copper or other ores in volume) but one spot doesn't really seem any better than another currently. Excepting trees. Oh. My. God. My friend and I ran through swathes of clear-cut land trying to find a few trees to settle near before even getting started.
[/list]

review:
Juego con muchisimo potencial! Sistema de Crafting muy solido, y comodo de usar. Tiene muchisimo contenido en objetos y cosas por hacer. Ojala esto empiece a crecer en este 2017. Si vienes de juegos estilo survivor y te gustan este tipo de graficas es una buena apuesta. Es muy entretenido jugar. OJO: Pese a lo anterior el juego en muchos aspectos esta verde aun. Precio elevado que hace que mucha gente no de el paso a probarlo.

author: {'steamid': '76561198011441004', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 2607, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2078, 'last_played': 1505915089}
review:
This review is made in response to most complains people make about this game..

First of all, there is no pay to win. All you get from VIP is a small bonus on resources gathering SPEED, which normally takes about a couple seconds on normal accounts. You can buy mounts from the store, still you can aquire them in game easily.

People complain about food. Food is the least of your problems once you know how the mechanics work. All these negative comments about food are from people who did not spend 2 minutes to understand how the system works. You can spend hours crafting and gathering eating almost nothing, not to mention the food is everywhere around you. Do not run, seriously, it will starve you in no time, running is supposed to be for emergencies and PvP engagements.

Heard about people complaining about hackers going into bases and looting stuff, well that is absolutely incorrect. Unfortunately if you place a chest right next to a low wall, people can access it, cause it`s a low wall. There is no hacking going on, simply don't build storages next to fences.

author: {'steamid': '76561198023801833', 'num_games_owned': 2257, 'num_reviews': 10, 'playtime_forever': 4302, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2711, 'last_played': 1508012239}
review:
UWAGA! Od razu napiszę: Grę można o wiele taniej kupić na głównej stronie producenta! (tam płacimy w złotówkach).
Gra ciekawa i warta uwagi. Jeśli lubisz średniowieczne klimaty, przetrwanie, PVP, crafting i budowanie to ta gra jest dla Ciebie. 
Plusy:
+ Mnóstwo przedmiotów do craftingu i budowania: Jak na alphe jest masa rzeczy do roboty
+ Gra jest po Polsku: Zawsze lepiej grać w ojczystym języku ;)
+ System umiejętności: Za każdą czynność jaką robimy wbijamy lvl danej umiejętności np. ścinając drzewo powiększamy "drwalstwo". Jeśli mamy za niski lvl to nie będziemy mogli ściąć wszystkich drzew. Dodatkowo jest coś takiego jak "szansa", przykładowo ścinając drzewo, które wymaga nieco wyższego lvl umiejętności to na wydobycie mamy powiedzmy 50% szansy.
+ Skille: W walce możemy używać skille np. doskok, wcześniej trzeba się ich nauczyć.
+ Świat kreowany przez użytkowników: Jest to gra online, więc każdy ma wpływ na to co na nim powstanie, wiele różnych zamków itd.

Minusy:
- Pusta mapa: Czasem chodząc znajdziemy pustą mapę i brzydko to wygląda, ale nic dziwnego skoro jest to gra online.
- Sztuczna inteligencja: IQ mobkow trochę kuleje, np. polując na królika ucieka przez chwilę w jedną stronę a potem staje i łatwo go tak upolować.
- Trochę sztywna walka, ale zmienia się to po uzyskaniu pierwszych skilli.
- Wbijanie lvl umiejętności strasznie długo trwa na późniejszych poziomach
- Sklep, niestety gra jest trochę p2w (głównie na serwerach PVP), można kupować sobie mounty oraz zwiększać szanse na wszystko i szybsze tworzenie przedmiotów.

author: {'steamid': '76561198063453500', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 40, 'playtime_forever': 415, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 68, 'last_played': 1540495623}
review:
Truth be told at first I refunded this game, I am glad I bought it again because I am having a blast with it. It's a more modern remake of the classic UO and other games of it's kind

~Pros~
-hardcore pvp with full loot on kill
-base raiding (which you don't have to do, there are PvE areas to build)
-resource gathering
-many skills to level up (and they all effect gameplay)
-reinvented old school combat mechanics
-time consuming but rewarding gameplay
-castle sieges
-farming
-taming and riding animals
-being afraid
-suffering from PTSD whenever you see a bear or a wolf 


~cons~
-smaller community at the present time
-devs respond very slow
-very limited game options (such as graphics volume etc)
-old school art (not a con for me but for alot of people it is a turn off)
-some geared players camp bambis just to be toxic (again can be avoided by going to pve)


Overall I am having alot of fun with this game and it truly is worth a shot, feel free to add me on steam I would be happy to help in anyway I can

author: {'steamid': '76561198230191016', 'num_games_owned': 49, 'num_reviews': 8, 'playtime_forever': 25718, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1178, 'last_played': 1587659431}

author: {'steamid': '76561198098441923', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 4, 'playtime_forever': 11104, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4806, 'last_played': 1571974000}
review:
It is an EA game, so keep that in mind before buying. 

Now that the disclaimer is out of the way, I have enjoyed playing this game and I have 80+ hours in.

If you have been looking for a crafting/building game reminicient of that genre of game from 90's PC, you will probably like this one. It includes, as well a nicely modeled PvP system, as an OPTION for gameplay. This option exists in the form of PvP areas and safe areas on official servers, and the ability to set up personal servers with gameplay options settings.

The staff too, are responsive and communicate with the player base. I personally had a bug issue repaired by them, even though it was something that I think a majority of users were not experiencing (graphics card issue probably).

Yes the player base is currently small, but there are people on most servers, most of the time. I have never seen them completely empty, and the players have been friendly and helpful.

If you have been looking for something else, like Banished, or Unreal World, good in thier own right, but with ongoing dev and better UI definately give this game a try.

author: {'steamid': '76561198007464758', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 12, 'playtime_forever': 23262, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 6962, 'last_played': 1570253875}
review:
Hello,

At the time of writing this, I am currently playing on the PVP server Golunar. So far I can say the game is very enjoyable but really requires a focused group to keep going. The crux of this game is it's best strength and it's biggest weakness: lack of handholding. 

Many players go into this game thinking that they can solo bears, solo foxes, and solo many others animals. There is also this thought that killing someone will not have consequences. Your actions do have consequences and people will take notice. Joining a new friendly group helps to alleviate this issue. Learning to fend for yourself can be hard but teaming up is a great way to avoid getting killed. Too many join and think they can solo. Progression in this game requires teamwork which involves varying amounts of diplomacy and conflict resolution.

Is this a perfect game? no, it's an alpha. But I think a lot of the reason this game receives a bad rap is because of the initial impressions that some have given by clubbing new players. I am currently trying to alleviate those pains by bringing new players in or offering to help them on Golunar. If you need help, my in game name is Freik.

author: {'steamid': '76561198053539720', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 13, 'playtime_forever': 1647, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 234, 'last_played': 1640436654}
review:
Настало время обзора!!!
Я хотел записать летсплей, постримить игру, но так вышло что подзатянул немного с этим. Скажу что игра достойная. Игра стоит своих денег. Но есть много нюансов, нестабильное фпс, при такой то графике это странно, фризит, так будто у меня ежесекундно отключается и включается интернет. Но это терпимо, я верю что поправят это все. Игра перешедшая из разряда браузерных игр, это откровенно говоря не новость! 
Плюсы: 
+Огромный мир
+Уйма крафта
+Убийство тонны времени на фарм ресурсов
+Разнообразная флора и фауна
+В скором времени будут гильдии
+Простота игры

Самое не приятное, минусы:
-Фризы
-Звери просто с тонной хп. (чтобы завалить оленя, надо выпустить в него стрел 10 на начальных уровнях)
-Хищники сносят тебя за 3 удара и бегают со скоростью гепарда (и это в средней броне)
-Зарейдить можно любого с двух выстрелов балисты
-адовая система прокачки навыков
-Смертность в игре зашкаливает

Подробнее смотрите обзоры игр и летсплеи на моем канале "DablDi Game"

10/10 баллист

author: {'steamid': '76561198032664231', 'num_games_owned': 375, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 6727, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2953, 'last_played': 1608353553}
review:
Качественная онлайн-песочница от российского разработчика. Здесь можно найти многое, что мило сердцу любого поклонника  игр данного жанра. Система скиллов, на коорой базируется всё, начиная от крафта и заканчивая боевыми умениями. Интересная и несложная система голода. Владение собсвенным участком земли на глобальной карте. Полноценное ПвЕ и хардорное фул-лут ПвП. И пусть вас не смущает, что проект находится в пре-альфа стадии. и пусть Терре ещё далеко до флагмана жанра (моё личное мнение) - ХиХ, развите проекта налицо. Регулярно проводятся обновления, балансовые правки, тематические ивенты. Разработка не стоит на месте. Ну а кому хочется предварительного знакомства с игрой перед покупкой, или нужны советы и помощь - добро пожаловать на мой канал. Вэлкам :)

author: {'steamid': '76561197990772910', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 14, 'playtime_forever': 70, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 53, 'last_played': 1502420330}
review:
This review was taken from my site http://moco.net, for more reviews of indie games please visit it. Thanks
___________________________________________________________________________

Sprinkle a little bit of addictive survival gameplay elements, add an improved Ultima Online look, finally throw in a load of people and what you have is Wild Terra Online!




Wild Terra Online
Journal – Entry #1
I awoke in a land not knowing where I was, what to do, or how I got there. Moments later only my name came back to me, a great Wild Terra Onlinesign. I did what anyone else would do and I started to explore my surroundings. I had nothing on me, nothing at all, not even clothes, except underwear. Greenery was everywhere lush pine trees were strewn about the land, lakes, and snow filled the landscape. It was a beautiful sight.

Survival mode kicked in. “Okay, most importantly I need food, and water”. I went to a tree and tried getting anything I could to make a weapon to hunt prey. Nope the branches were to strong and tree too sturdy. I would need to craft a tool to cut down branches from the trees. On my way to this tree I noticed piles of stones in random areas. “Okay” I thought, “I could use these to make a stone knife and then use the knife to cut down branches”. I was happily collecting rocks, I only needed about three or so, but I collected one hundred and thirty. Something so damn addictive about gathering these things, something that would extend to everything in my game session.

 

Wild Terra Online 2Time went by and finally I had enough rocks. I needed wooden scraps to make a knife. I explored more and right when I was about to give up, I found them. A knife was made and I quickly went from tree to tree. I cut down every branch I could so that my next tool. ‘the stone hatchet’ could be made. With the hatchet I could cut down trees for wood, and with wood I could make spears, with spears I could now hunt. Do you see the progression? It was pretty damn fun going through it, the carrot on the stick game play kept me wanting more.

I won’t lie, I died a few times, I mean a fox put me to sleep a few times. Thankfully the run back to your body isn’t too long and all of your equipment is still there. I was warned however, each time I left the peaceful area. I don’t know much about it but I believe if you leave it you’re fair game for anyone to kill, so tread carefully.

Overall I enjoyed my short session with Wild Terra Online, and I look forward to seeing what else it has to offer.

author: {'steamid': '76561198033848875', 'num_games_owned': 350, 'num_reviews': 38, 'playtime_forever': 1435, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 907, 'last_played': 1528811553}
review: Hatte grosse Hoffnungen in dieses Spiel gesetzt aber irgendwie liest man nur russisch im Chat obwohl es da eigene Server gibt. Der ingame Shop funktioniert nicht und so kann man nicht mal Premiumzeit nachkaufen. Die gesamte Mechanik wurde verschlimmbessert und endet nun in einer Hasenjagtsimulation, um übehaupt weiter zu kommen. Insgesamt ist es nun leider ein sehr langweiliges Spiel geworden, obwohl mich diese Art Spiel ansonsten sehr anspricht ist hier nicht mehr der Fall. Dazu kommt das ich mal vor Ewigkeiten ein grosses Grundstück gekauft hatte und nun mit einem kleinen abgespeist werde das man upgraden kann, da aber wieder die Hasenjagt ins Spiel kommt.

author: {'steamid': '76561197967510649', 'num_games_owned': 457, 'num_reviews': 6, 'playtime_forever': 6348, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 4662, 'last_played': 1551888440}
review:
Enorme potencial, inmensa cantidad de cosas por hacer.
El progreso es lento, pero como cualquier trabajo duro, la recompensa a la larga es muy gratificante.

Es imposible no llevar un juego a la comparación de otros, y este podría llegar a ser un gran sucesor del memorable Ultima Online.

Los desarrolladores tienen un duro trabajo por delante, espero que puedan llegar a algo grande y poder crecer viendo su progreso. Desde aquí les deseo lo mejor, y como usuario que disfruta de su creación darle las gracias por ello.

Cosas a mejorar; el netcode, los servidores actualmente tienen algunos problemas de estabilidad, el enfrentamiento pvp se hace duro y difícil si la sincronización entre cliente servidor no es precisa (la inestabilidad de latencia es un problema). Espero esto cambie lo antes posible, y le den la prioridad que merece (toda). 


La supervivencia, puedes subsistir sin mayor problema, siempre y cuando no te encuentres en el caso de un servidor  pvp con un clan "consolidado". El "sleepraid" es un problema, tienen que pensar como solventar el problema de que no todo el mundo puede estar conectado 24/7. Y no todos los que juegan, lo hacen con amigos o un clan grande.
En servidores pve, puedes sobrevivir fácilmente, siempre y cuando no te enfrentes a un gran animal tu solo y sin recursos para ello.

Luego hay nimiedades como cualquier juego en desarrollo, pero ellos (los dev) tendrán sus prioridades. Sabrán solventarlas poco a poco.

Saludos

author: {'steamid': '76561197976104660', 'num_games_owned': 992, 'num_reviews': 69, 'playtime_forever': 791, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 457, 'last_played': 1482420264}
review:
[h1]The Good[/h1]
-- 90's Isometric Interface/machination
-- Solid crafting and base building system
-- Medieval and tribal aesthetic
-- Mounted combat
-- Sandbox roots

[h1]The Bad[/h1]
-- Sandbox roots. Good because there's enough 'free will' to explore most crafting/combat types with progression in each one, but there's not a lot of options available to you in terms of progressing or leveling up each skillset (except crafting), and you're forced to harvest from a node-like world (like The Forest or Subsistence) instead of being able to use absolutely everything on the map (like 7 days to die or Ark) 
-- Combat is definitely lackluster. It doesn't entirely suck, but projectiles and melee leave a lot to be desired.
-- Recipes for crafting decent equipments and structures are gated and require a LOT of searching and grinding to find and unlock
-- Population scarcity.

[h1]The Ugly[/h1]
-- Every screen looks identical to the one before it. The only variation comes when you get an identical screen with snow covering the same backdrop you just saw 20 seconds before. Environments need a huge upgrade/expansion.
-- Early hunting on anything other than a grouse or hare is frustratingly disparaging. A 120% quality bow still takes an average of 10 shots to down a deer, and more for a wolf or boar. Chasing animals gets to be a big ordeal that feels more cumbersome than rewarding.
-- A nearly non-existent soundscape. Most of the sounds are recycled and there's not much variation between things like landing a javelin throw or hitting a tree. There's hardly any ambiance as well-- half the time you'll probably find yourself seeing if you didn't accidentally mute your computer because there's just no sound coming from the game.
-- Everyone looks like identical twins. :-/
-- Hunger system needs a revamp. The requirements are a bit absurd and unless you've got a good system going, staying fed becomes your primary focus/activity more than expanding your base does. 

I'd recommend this if you're a fan of isometric sandboxes lke Ultima Online. It feels almost like a successor at times (in the absolute most basic sense of the term), and I have a strong suspicion that this game will see a heavy improvement over the next year.

author: {'steamid': '76561198058084998', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 15, 'playtime_forever': 3476, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2725, 'last_played': 1525271215}

author: {'steamid': '76561198010971555', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 5, 'playtime_forever': 2769, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1080, 'last_played': 1571527498}
review: Think Don't Starve with a blend of Haven and Hearth and you will have a feel for this inde sandbox.  Once you have decided on PVE lands with pvp zones or the full-blown open world pvp, you are dropped into your choice with nothing but a deep desire to gather and explore.  Animals are plentious but not all friendly.  Fashioning primitive tools allows you to  hunt rabbits, birds and small game while locating a suitable place to claim for your own.  A primitive house and a bed of branches lead up to further construction and production while watching over your claim from poachers who would take what they can reach.  The grind is not too grindy and the pace is relaxing.  Skills are gained by using them and death is very certain if you get too close to the dangerous bears, boars, wolves and other obvious predators.  But there are some much appreciated helps in the game.  Rather than a map, a floating icon always points in the direction of your home and/or your body as the case may be.  Building walls can protect your claim from poachers and give you room to set up production properly.  The game is in early access but already there is a wealth of things to do.  The crafting is of the typical gather this to make that, and there is lots to do.  It is very solo-friendly, at least in the PVE lands.  The most frustrating part of my first 15 hours was failing so frequently when my skills in a particular thing indicated low percentages of success - but it was expected and makes crafting a rewarding passtime.  There is a wiki but it is deficient of content.  Global chat seems to be the best way to get information on the many crafting stations already in the game.  This game has much potential and is already a fullfilling experience.  If you like sandbox crafting coupled with a survival experience, you will feel at home in Wild Terra.  Get it.

review: Ich habe 50 Euro bezahlt, mit dem Hinweis ein großes Stück Land zu bekommen, was aber nicht der Fall war, weil es am nächsten Tag 100 Euro kostete. Dieser Frühzugang für dieses Spiel war nicht einmal 20 Euro wert. Für ein 2 D Spiel, - das sich damit befast, - um gut Leveln zu können erst einmal 100 000 Kaninchen zu killen, oder 100 000 Eisenerz zu sammeln, schnell zur Monotomie entartet. Die Geschmäcker sind verschieden, - doch das hier ist nichts für mich, - 50 Euro verbrannt, - und mit meinem Wissen würde ich heute nicht mal 13 Euro dafür bezahlen. Geldgier steht hier an erster Stelle, - nicht das Spiel, - das mit Gewissheit sehr schnelle sterbende Server haben wird.

author: {'steamid': '76561197964889006', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 84, 'playtime_forever': 5876, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1861, 'last_played': 1631022366}
review:
This reminds me a lot of UO+Don't Starve+Rust, in a good way. I recommend it, but only to people that understand what they're getting into. You will grind food and resources, die to animals, starve to death, and get stabbed by Knight Chance. If that doesn't sound like a good time, by all means please don't buy it.

If you're still with me, then also please be warned that the game is very much in an alpha state. New systems are being added and rebuilt. The translation to English is fairly recent, and there's not really any guidance or tutorial in the game so you'll have to rely on chatting with other players to figure it out. That's the fun in it, currently.

author: {'steamid': '76561198049568902', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 70, 'playtime_forever': 2423, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 946, 'last_played': 1505900787}
review:
I like this game kind of, but the hours do not fly by. I have played for 11 hrs and it feels like I have played 2 - 3 times as long.

The game offers some for the old Ultima Online fans, along with the survival builder crowd. The problem is, there is absolutely no point to Wild Terra outside of 'just' base building. The terrain all looks the same with a never ending expanse of ground textures which ultimately look the same. You do not get a map, but you do get grind coordinates. At first I did not care, but after 10 hours of just aimless wandering and walking back towards your home, it got to me. Largely because the world of Wild Terra has no character, no thrill, or immersion. For example, imagine being the guy/gal who pulled players together and built a castle at the northern reach, defying wolf, bear, and play alike. There is just a flat terrian of repeatable images you'd see in a tablet game. I honestly nodded off while walking around.

The game is very, very grindy and fairly unrewarding. While I do want to feel like I achieved something in the game and really built something, I really would like to see something other than a small, small, small, small advancement for my time.

Currently you can kill a...
Bear
Wolf 
Boar
Deer
some ferret looking thing...
Hare
Bird
Goose
and players.

Other than that, you're not killing anything else. I guess once you get to kill bears easily, you're done playing unless you like PvP. There are not very many people online, but I found that with about 40 people online at the same time, resources become scarce at times.

It is just not as fun as it could be.
developer_response: Thanks for review. In patch 8.22, we strongly reduce the importance of grind in the game

author: {'steamid': '76561198022839753', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 74, 'playtime_forever': 5135, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 917, 'last_played': 1597943889}
review:
2020 may 29 updated.

Bought this game in 2017 and its free now.
Also seems to be the same game under the same name with a number 2 on it.
Aaaand there is a cash shop.
 -some pay to win things in there, they disguised as pay to progress.
Holding ALT for forever to run, no toggle or setting to always run.
-sometimes bugs out and forces you to run even if youre wanting to walk
-walking seems excessively slow to allow stamina to choke your exploration, not fun.
Mounting on your mount is not a fun thing, just another long timed channel bar.
-mounting up doesnt stop you running you gota wait until you are standing still.. so much for fun hey.. not.
Looks like combat is is still whack.
-1.. only 1 action bar, no lock unlock to switch from pve to pvp action bars, just stuck moving yer bars always dealing with a clunky menu,
-Shift click to attack still shoots and throws ranged weapons if you are too far away.
-cannot retrieve ammo after used, its always lost ammo if used.
-unable to change tools equipped with full hands.
-items dont stack up in inventory with full inv
-No mounted combat, the coolest thing hte game could offer, doesn't offer, infact you can do nothing but explore on a mount, just run around.. yawn
You cannot ALT click run to open your storage boxes.
ERROR messages are right ontop of your character, along with other information, just a big spam slot location for words
No map still and cartography instead which has a limit of 2.
Stamina is still chokes your our character
Still mass channel bars for everything, gathering ,crafting etc..
Actions don't pause you, you will keep moving while trying to mount, gota hit shift.. so bad.
Beginner crafted storage is weak, bugger all slots.
  -need to mass crafted lots of little storages, so bad.
  -no auto stacking items in storage, you must click spam things to and from inventory to manually stack them then put back in storage.
-or drag and drop every single thing.
-lots of things have tiny stack amounts of 20 or less.
-opening storages doesnt remember where you moved the storage window so it will open where you closed it, instead it will always open it right smack dab over the center of your screen covering your character and anything you're doing so you can't see your player, maybe getting killed by something if you have sound off.
Player inventory is weak, bugger all slots.
No hotkey to display items on the ground, or animals or tree's or anything, you have to mouse over every single thing and wait for the stoned tooltip to display.
Holding your mouse button in to move bugs out if you mouse too close to your character, you will need to click again and sometimes the character ignores the command and will just stand still.
If you have another stack of spears or ammo in your inventory and you just used a stack of spears you need to equip that stack, there is no smart combat, the combat is super basic like clickathon-arthritus-unhealthy.
If you hotkey your spears it wont auto craft them if you click attack or use the hotkey to equip when you run out while fighting, you need to open yer bloody menus.. while fighting.. its not a smart combat system.
Battle Focus and Craftsmans Insight, mechanics to slow down your progress by saying they enhance it.. but has a limit? just more limitations for no reason.
Crafting doesn't have an "ALL" button to craft all, you gota manually enter in a number everytime.
Cuttings burn almost instantly in a campfire, asif it were paper.

The grind of the game is better, but the inventory management just kills it.
Your storage and character from the start are just struggling to store stuff.
developer_response: Thanks for review. In patch 8.22, we strongly reduce the importance of grind in the game

author: {'steamid': '76561197972444517', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 1, 'playtime_forever': 3257, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 1018, 'last_played': 1485801475}

author: {'steamid': '76561198072485016', 'num_games_owned': 0, 'num_reviews': 96, 'playtime_forever': 2711, 'playtime_last_two_weeks': 0, 'playtime_at_review': 2711, 'last_played': 1483653980}
review:
Edit after 45 hour in the game. What bothers me the most is that it is being sold as an Ultima Online lookalike. Not even close! No dungeons, no epic locations, no towns, castles, nothing of that kind. This is a game that is totaly NOT like ultima online. The sandbox element is funish as well as frustrating as hell at the same time. I played on PVE server for the sake of exploring what can be made and even there if you do not fence yourself properly the stuff you would like to kee would simply be stolen. The progress is slow for new starters and it speeds up when you become more experienced and gather more skills. Food production plays an essential role but is for some reason made super hard for new joiners (??) so that you will be spending half of your time gathering and eating food. Talk about an overkill!

Pros: Sandbox, forces you to join with others and socialize to achieve anything and preserve your position, pvp option. Also devs react fast to feedback so there might be hope.

Cons: Unifinished, clunky, buggy. Recipes require massive rebalancing especially on food and farming. Clay jug and plate get spent when you eat a dish (really, one cant reuse those, one needs to live like in modern times wasting everything while resources are scarce in super tough survival world??) And false advertising needs to be included, this is nothing like UO! And for the end player population is extremly low in my view.

And dont give me that "it's alpha so you dont get the right to criticize it" junk. They charge money for it and they need to face the feedback. When you sell a product you need to stand behind it. I didn't refund for the sake of supporting indie studios and this might become a good game. But not just now.
